Physics Simulations by Gabriel Damon

These simulations were built by Gabriel Damon using ProcessingJS. The concepts displayed in these simulations are based on my AP Physics course as well as the excellent book The Nature of Code. The site is built using Jekyll and is hosted on Github. The site is styled with Sass, assisted by csstyle and Scut. All programming was done in Sublime Text on a Linux box running Ubuntu Gnome.

1D Collisions
